name: Valonteer Drama by BrokenOcean
description:
In this city, no one cleans up the garbage. People stopped taking money for garbage collection, companies that cleaned garbage before went bankrupt and closed. And people don't want to pay money for the export, because it has become so expensive that they have better worries. And only volunteers save the city by cleaning playgrounds, parks, squares. The main character is an ordinary resident, lives with his family: wife, son. One day he goes for a walk in the yard, where his son accidentally eats something and gets poisoned. He does not die, but falls ill and lies in bed. The main character decides that his son's life is more important than money, time and everything else. He doesn't want anyone else to get into this situation.

The player will have to take control of a volunteer whose task is to clean the streets of the city from garbage, restore its ecosystem. Fill garbage bags and put them in your car and do garbage recycling.

Controls: WASD to move F - to interract Use WASD to move around, collect garbage(F) until the bag in the upper left corner is full, then carry the garbage into the box.

To find out the story of the hero, press the spacebar (when watching a comic)

DEVELOPERS
BrokenOceanCrew:

Андрей Кузюков - Unity

Виталий "OCTO" Ким - Art
